sellerCard.oneLiner: Take Challenges and bring them to life
sellerCard.description:
I'm a dedicated Frontend Web Developer passionate about transforming code into captivating user experiences. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next JS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, GSAP, Sanity, Node JS, WordPress, and Webflow, I bring your visions to life. Committed to excellence, I ensure high-quality work and client satisfaction.

Services I Offer:

‚úÖ Stunning Landing Pages
‚úÖ Pixel-perfect PSD to HTML/CSS
‚úÖ Dynamic React Websites
‚úÖ Engaging Animated Websites
‚úÖ Comprehensive Frontend Solutions

Let's create outstanding digital experiences together! üöÄ

description.content:
Build Blazing-Fast, SEO-Ready Websites with React.js, Next.js & Modern Tech Stacks!

Hi! I'm a full-stack web developer with 2+ years of expertise in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, Tailwind CSS, and GSAP, Framer Motion animations. Whether you need a dynamic web app or a landing page or to convert designs (Figma/XD) into code, I craft high-performance, mobile-first websites that rank on Google and wow users.


My Expertise:

  • Scalable React.js & Next.js apps
  • Pixel-perfect Figma to responsive code
  • Sleek UI/UX with Tailwind CSS & SASS
  • Dynamic GSAP scroll effects and animations
  • Framer Motion interactions for engaging UI
  • Full-stack Node.js and CMS (Sanity/Strapi) integration
  • API integrations with TypeScript excellence
  • Optimized performance with 90+ PageSpeed scores


 Why Work With Me?

Ô∏è 100% Responsive Design

Ô∏è Clean, Scalable Code

Ô∏è SEO-Ready: Meta tags, structured data, and speed optimization.

Ô∏è 24/7 Support


Lets Collaborate!

Whether you're a startup launching an MVP, a designer needing development help, or a business upgrading your site, message me now! I'll provide a free consultation, clarify your goals, and deliver a site that converts visitors into customers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you send me live demo link when you are working on ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide you a live demo link from my own domain/hosting/Vercel so you can see what happen now on your reactjs application on your own computer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you also convert Figma PSD XD file to React/Next JS
Can you work with Tailwind, GSAP Bootstrap, Material UI OR Chakra UI
Can you make smooth scrolling effects?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, smooth scrolling, I can make a variety of custom as well as popular effects.
